firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Quad J Realty
firm_information.location: 1305 N. E. Big Bend Trail Glen Rose, TX 76043

house_listing.house_description: Beautiful, almost new, home in exclusive subdivision. Gorgeous views from full back porch. Lots of closets and storage space. 9 foot ceilings throughout living area. Open concept home with lots of amenities. Big upstairs loft room for extra bedroom or game room. Great living in the peaceful countryside.

highlights.item: Exclusive new subdivision with beautiful homes
Gorgeous views from full back porch
Lots of closets and storage space
Open concept home with lots of amenities
